oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Post-business session cup of tea, circa 1950 December 05
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of the 1950 Fannie Battle Social Workers Carol Chairman, Mrs. John Dubuisson (pictured seated at table), photographed at the annual Christmas tea with (from left) Mrs. Alvin Beaman and Mrs. R.Y. Thorpe and Mrs. James V. Blevins, president (standing, right). This photograph illustrated the newspaper article "Betty Banner Heeds Bid to Fannie Battle Holiday Tea," published in the 5 December 1950 issue of the Nashville Banner. Forms part of the Fannie Battle Day Home Records. 1 photograph : b & w ; 7.5 x 9.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Dubuisson, John, Mrs.; Beaman, Alvin, Mrs.; Thorpe, R.Y., Mrs.; Blevins, James V., Mrs.
